abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Brassica tournefortii Gouan" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Dataflos 1 records from The AAU Herbarium Database 1 records from Instituto Pirenaico de Ecología-CSIC: Herbarium JACA 1 records from Herbário João de Carvalho e Vasconcellos, I.S.A./U.L. 1 records from Données naturalistes d'Olivier ESCUDER 1 records from Herbario EMMA. Herbario de la Escuela Técnica Superior de Ingenieros de Montes. UPM 1 records from RL Minckley Insect and Plant Collection 1 records from MEXU/Plantas Vasculares 1 records from inatura - Erlebnis Naturschau Dornbirn 1 records from Plant specimens in the Museum of Nature and Human Activities, Hyogo Prefecture, Japan 1 records from Herbario de la Universidad Pública de Navarra, Pamplona: UPNA-H 1 records from Universidad de Oviedo. Departamento de Biología de Organismos y Sistemas: FCO-Briof 1 records from Dr Mary Gillham Archive Project 1 records from Bush Heritage - Carnarvon Station Reserve 1 records from VIT Herbarium - Vascular Plants (The Natural History Museum of Alava) 1 records from FloraCAT: Banco de datos de los cormófitos de Cataluña 1 records from Herbarium specimens, Harmas J.H. Fabre (FABR - Sérignan-du-Comtat) of the Muséum national d'Histoire naturelle (MNHN - Paris) 1 records from University of South Carolina, A. C.
